channel.title: Adding color to your yell (delta)

item.title: Adding color to your yell (delta)
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

deathschaos9:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,424444.0.html

Yes, you need to modify the client before colors will appear in the chatbox, therefore this tutorial is invalid unless you’ve already done so. Also we have a topic explaining how to do this with the client modification steps, as deathchaos9 already stated.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding color to your yell (delta)
item.dc:creator: @blddyboy blddyboy
item.description:
@blddyboy wrote:

go into client.java and look up the pickup command and post this under it

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) { String titles = ""; if (playerRights == 4) { titles = "@bla@[Player]-"; } if (playerRights == 0) { titles = "@bla@[Player]-"; } if (donator == 1) { titles = "@whi@[Donator]-"; } if (playerRights == 1) { titles = "@yel@[Moderator]-"; } if (playerRights == 2) { titles = "@blu@[Admin]-"; } if (playerRights == 3) { titles = "@red@[CO-OWNER]-"; } if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Your name here")) { titles = "@gre@[OWNER&CODER]-"; } yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": " + command.substring(5)); }

Read full topic
